trans-unit.source: Describes an intermediate language (IL) instruction.
trans-unit.target: 描述 Intermediate Language (IL) 指令。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the current instance is equal to a specified object.
trans-unit.target: 指出目前執行個體和指定的物件是否相等。

trans-unit.source: The object to compare to this object.
trans-unit.target: 要與這個物件比較的物件。

trans-unit.source: Tests whether the given object is equal to this <see langword="Opcode" />.
trans-unit.target: 測試指定物件是否等於這個 <see langword="Opcode" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="obj" /> is an instance of <see langword="Opcode" /> and is equal to this object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="Opcode" /> 是 <paramref name="obj" /> 的執行個體，並且與這個物件相等，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode" /> to compare to the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 要與目前執行個體相比較的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode" />。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the current instance is equal to the specified <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode" />.
trans-unit.target: 指出目前的執行個體和指定的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode" /> 是否相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the value of <paramref name="obj" /> is equal to the value of the current instance; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="obj" /> 的值和目前執行個體的值相等則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The flow control characteristics of the intermediate language (IL) instruction.
trans-unit.target: Intermediate Language (IL) 指令的流量控制 (Flow Control) 特性。

trans-unit.source: Read-only.
trans-unit.target: 唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The type of flow control.
trans-unit.target: 流程控制的類型。

trans-unit.source: Returns the generated hash code for this <see langword="Opcode" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個 <see langword="Opcode" /> 的已產生雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個執行個體的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: The name of the intermediate language (IL) instruction.
trans-unit.target: Intermediate Language (IL) 指令的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Read-only.
trans-unit.target: 唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The name of the IL instruction.
trans-unit.target: IL 指令的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode.Value%2A> property returns the numeric value of the IL instruction.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode.Value%2A>屬性會傳回 IL 指令的數值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode" /> to compare to <c>b</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要與 <c>b</c> 比較的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode" /> to compare to <c>a</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要與 <c>a</c> 比較的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode" />。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether two <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode" /> structures are equal.
trans-unit.target: 指出兩個 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode" /> 結構是否相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="a" /> is equal to <paramref name="b" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 等於 <paramref name="a" />，則為 <paramref name="b" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode.Equals%28System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 這個運算子的對等方法是<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode.Equals%28System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode" /> to compare to <c>b</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要與 <c>b</c> 比較的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode" /> to compare to <c>a</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要與 <c>a</c> 比較的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode" />。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether two <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode" /> structures are not equal.
trans-unit.target: 指出兩個 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode" /> 結構是否不相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="a" /> is not equal to <paramref name="b" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 不等於 <paramref name="a" />，則為 <paramref name="b" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode.Equals%28System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 這個運算子的對等方法是<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode.Equals%28System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The type of intermediate language (IL) instruction.
trans-unit.target: Intermediate Language (IL) 指令的類型。

trans-unit.source: Read-only.
trans-unit.target: 唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The type of intermediate language (IL) instruction.
trans-unit.target: Intermediate Language (IL) 指令的類型。

trans-unit.source: The operand type of an intermediate language (IL) instruction.
trans-unit.target: Intermediate Language (IL) 指令的運算元類型。

trans-unit.source: Read-only.
trans-unit.target: 唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The operand type of an IL instruction.
trans-unit.target: IL 指令的運算元類型。

trans-unit.source: The size of the intermediate language (IL) instruction.
trans-unit.target: Intermediate Language (IL) 指令的大小。

trans-unit.source: Read-only.
trans-unit.target: 唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The size of the IL instruction.
trans-unit.target: IL 指令的大小。

trans-unit.source: How the intermediate language (IL) instruction pops the stack.
trans-unit.target: Intermediate Language (IL) 指令如何從堆疊中取出。

trans-unit.source: Read-only.
trans-unit.target: 唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The way the IL instruction pops the stack.
trans-unit.target: IL 指令從堆疊中取出的方式。

trans-unit.source: How the intermediate language (IL) instruction pushes operand onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: Intermediate Language (IL) 指令如何將運算元推送至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: Read-only.
trans-unit.target: 唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The way the IL instruction pushes operand onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: IL 指令將運算元推送至堆疊的方式。

trans-unit.source: Returns this <see langword="Opcode" /> as a <see cref="T:System.String" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個 <see langword="Opcode" /> 做為 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.String" /> containing the name of this <see langword="Opcode" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.String" />，包含這個 <see langword="Opcode" /> 的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets the numeric value of the intermediate language (IL) instruction.
trans-unit.target: 取得中繼語言 (IL) 指令的數值。

trans-unit.source: Read-only.
trans-unit.target: 唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The numeric value of the IL instruction.
trans-unit.target: IL 指令的數值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode.Name%2A> property returns the string name that corresponds to the instruction's numeric value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode.Name%2A>屬性會傳回對應的字串名稱指令的數值。

trans-unit.source: The following example displays the property values of the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Add?displayProperty=nameWithType> instruction.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示的屬性值<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Add?displayProperty=nameWithType>指令。
